changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Donne la qualité de l'air (nécessite l'a: Gives air quality (requires activation of the corresponding plugin in openjabnab)
index.md.Donne les ephémérides (nécessite l'activ: Give ephemeris (requires activation of the corresponding plugin in openjabnab)
index.md.Donne l'heure (nécessite l'activation du: Give the time (requires activation of the corresponding plugin in openjabnab)
index.md.Donne la météo (nécessite l'activation d: Gives the weather (requires activation of the corresponding plugin in openjabnab)

index.md.Permet de choisir la position de l'oreil: Allows you to choose the position of the left ear (16 positions possible)
Allows you to choose the position of the right ear (16 possible positions)
